article_title: Union reaches agreement with Giant Eagle, Heinen's
article_text:

article_metadata.description: Supermarket News your source for Supermarket news, top lists and retailer info
article_metadata.title: Union reaches agreement with Giant Eagle, Heinen's

og.description: Unionized grocery workers in the Cleveland area have reached a tentative contract agreement with employers Giant Eagle and Heinen's, United Food and Commercial Workers Local 880 said Wednesday.
og.title: Union reaches agreement with Giant Eagle, Heinen's
